company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Key Responsibilities 1.	Work closely with line leadership to understand business and talent pressures in order to propose, develop and implement effective people strategies and solutions.2.	Plan workforce strategically so that the designated organizational unit or function has the capable talent required to deliver business results.3.	Drive the people processes (performance, development, and career) to ensure that employees’ level of performance and capabilities meet current and future standards.4.	Ensure alignment of goals and objectives of the organizational unit or function and those of the employees to maximize organizational and individual performance. 5.	Diagnose and solve organizational issues so that the organizational unit or function can achieve its desired performance and growth levels. 6.	Identify capability gaps in employees and manages and propose learning and development solutions to close the gaps and drive performance, development, engagement and retention. 7.	Provide data-driven people and organizational insights so that line leadership team can make informed business and people decisions.8.	Service as a trusted advisor on people-related matters to line leadership so that they are empowered to deal with people issues.9.	Lead team-building initiatives in order to build trust, engagement and collaboration among employees and managers.10.	Partner with HR Shared Services and Community of Practices to deliver great employee and manager experience of HR services.11.	Drive positive organizational change to promote high-performance culture/organization. 12.	Ensure business and HR process compliance in order to mitigate organizational risks.13.	Manage specific projects as determined in the annual HR operational plan as well as participating in functional and cross-functional initiatives.
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: At least Bachelor's degree (Master’s is preferred) in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Organizational Development or related field2.	Experiences: o	8 years of work experience in the field of human resource management, preferably 2 or 3 years working in a HR-business partnership model.o	 Work experience in private sector, preferably in FMCG, supply chain management or manufacturingo	Experience in using HRMS/SAP or other HR-related systems3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including workforce planning, talent acquisition, talent development, performance employee engagement, employee relations, organizational development, and etc.o	Ability to comprehend, interpret, and apply the appropriate sections of applicable laws, guidelines, regulations, ordinances, and policies.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	 Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

Job Description:
** Location: Phnom Penh
** Reporting:  Marketing and Sales Manager
** Employment basis: Full-time 
** Time commitment: 5 days per week
** Travel requirements: Some travel to provinces based on needs and budget, standard travel expenses covered by ATEC

Responsibilities
● Manage and lead a growing sales team to achieved daily sales performance targets
● Ensure digital and telesales data is accurate and kept up to date in CRM system (HubSpot)
● Review and set sales performance targets with Marketing and Sales Manager and Country Director to achieve organizational goals
● Develop sales strategies and plans to continue to grow sales and revenue
● Work closely with Marketing team to ensure high quality leads are generated for Sales Team
● Use quantitative data to make recommendations and decisions
● Lead regular 1-2-1 coaching with sales team to continuously improve skills, motivate and performance manage
● Support Sales Team when escalating customer problems and interact with customers directly if required
● Recruit, train and develop new and existing Sales Team staff

What we are looking for
● You are a very customer-driven thinker and enjoy coaching your team to reach company sales targets
● You are a team player and a have a hands-on approach to solving problems
● You are open to learning new things and are goal-oriented
● You are a detailed-focused, data and process-driven person
● You can analyze large amounts of data to identify trends and patterns
● You can work to targets and motivate your team to perform at their highest level
● You can plan out and help the team prioritize calls to ensure all leads are being contacted according to service level agreements (SLAs)
Job Requirement:
Skill requirements:
● Bachelor degree in Marketing or Sales or related field 
● 3+ years work experience as a sales supervisor managing a small call center or sales team
● Strong in working to and exceeding targets
● Strong analytical skills and comfortable with numbers
● Proven track record of increasing revenue through lead conversion
● Able to speak and write in English

Benefits
● Competitive salary and benefits package
● 15-day seniority payment per year, paid 6 monthly
● ATEC follows Cambodian Labour Law, including public holidays determined by Prakas
● 18 day annual leave as required by MOLVT
● Maternity,  Paternity and compassionate leave
●  Health and Accident insurance, NSSF and Private insurance company. 

Why join ATEC?
● We’re an innovative social enterprise in Cambodia
● Learn new way of doing marketing through A/B testing and utilize all feature in META
● ATEC is now in an exciting phase of expanding our electric induction stove eCook and Biodigester technology across Cambodia
● We will provide you with an exciting and challenging environment where you will have the opportunity to contribute and impact the organisation and Cambodian people  
● There will be opportunities for you to get involved in internal and external marketing campaigns that promote clean cooking, ATEC's impact, gender equality, best practice sales and marketing approaches 
● Learn international best practice for growing a business across several countries
Company Profile:
ATEC exists to solve clean cooking and climate change. We are an award-winning social enterprise that produces, sells and services pre-fabricated biodigesters for rural farming families and provides magnetic induction stoves to on-grid customers. To date over 2300 units bio and 3500 eCook have been installed. Our eCook induction stoves provide customers with access to the electricity grid with a modern, clean cooking option.

ATEC is leading 1 billion emerging market households to transition to modern, decarbonised cooking through disruptive IoT cooking products - delivering cost efficiency to households, data-validated carbon credits to net-zero partners, and aggregated usage data for grid providers. 

At 24 staff, ATEC is now entering the next exciting phase of expanding these technologies across Cambodia and is growing the team to support the expansion. 
Please see www.atecbio.com and www.ecookstove.com  as well as our international website www.atecglobal.io for more information.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr.Suon Sinuon HR Manager (+855) 96 92 81 366 / 017 88 99 39 ssuon@atecglobal.io  #1159 National Road 02, Phumi Prektanu Sangkat Chakangrelue, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia (+855) 96 92 81 366 / 017 88 99 39

Job Description:
•	Supervision of Admin department in general
•	Automate the monitoring of various activities and contracts (Service / Maintenance)
•	Provide reports to management on regular basis on the activities managed and cost cutting initiatives.
•	Management (including negotiation) of annually maintenance contracts) with vendors or suppliers
•	Monitor, supervise and ensure safety measures are incorporated into all business office development
•	Co-ordination and management of all administrative issues like hygiene, stationeries, & welfare…ect.
•	Develop and maintain up-to-date, effective security measures to protect the Bank’s properties and staff
•	Ensure all rents are paid promptly
•	Supervise all maintenance activities and maintain a regular schedule of maintenance for the Bank’s properties
•	Establish the SLAs for all service providers and suppliers and monitor its compliance.
•	Maintain clean surroundings on daily bases throughout the working day and times
•	Ensure adequate records of fleet management/movement, and put in place policies/structures to guard against abuse
•	Proper management and efficient utilization of stores
•	Deliver all admin services in the most efficient manner to facilitate the functions of other departments
•	Ensure strict compliance with guidelines and policies of the Bank
•	Ensure that the Bank has adequate cover for its fixed assets, against fraud and accidents
•	Manage all protocol assignments of the Bank
•	Ensure administration staffs are trained on best practices in their roles
•	Management of fuel consumption (generator /office cars / contracts…ect.)
•	Maintaining the bank’s alarm system
•	Other duties as assigned by management

* Key Responsible for Procurement Role: 

•	Development of procurement strategies , policy and procedure
•	Sourcing and engaging reliable suppliers and vendors.
•	Negotiating with suppliers and vendors to secure advantageous terms.
•	Reviewing existing contracts with suppliers and vendors to ensure on-going feasibility.
•	Building and maintaining long-term relationships with vendors and suppliers.
•	Approving purchase orders and organizing and confirming delivery of goods and services based on the assignment from management.
•	Performing risk assessments on potential contracts and agreements.
•	Controlling the procurement budget and promoting a culture of long-term saving on procurement costs.
•	To get the quotation, and purchase order for relevant office suppliers, and materials and equipment
•	Negotiation of quotations and other related to procurement process, and
•	Ensure correct internal control procedure for purchases are adhered with project of the bank requirement. 
•	Preparing procurement reports.
•	Other tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
•	Holding a bachelor’s degree in Public Admin/Management or related field. 
•	At least 5 years of working experience in financial services and 3 years experience as management related to Admin and Procurement.
•	Good verbal and written communication skill in English, and other languages is a plus.
•	Focus on admin and procurement management, deliver result and exercises and sound judgement.
•	Work independently and good working relationship with other stakeholders.
•	Good computing skills (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email and Internet).
•	Good at of inter communication and negotiation skills.
•	A willingness to operate in a complex, matrix environment with multiple, often conflicting demands.
•	Flexible with the ability to assimilate quickly into a demanding role/environment.

* Experience Profile

Summarize the pre-requisite skills and knowledge required to perform this position, as well as any formal qualifications or training needed.

At least 5 years of working experience in financial services and 3 years experience as management related to admin and procurement and strongly communication and negotiation skills.

Job Description:
- Business strategy, development, product marketing & branding
-	Work with the COO and relevant management on the strategic vision including fostering and cultivating stakeholder relationships at all levels. 
-	Assist COO in identifying new business opportunities by projecting acquisition and expansion prospects.
-	Responsible for plan, manage and take overall responsible for the implementation and evaluation of the bank’s marketing plan and branding strategy.
-	Increase the bank’s brand image and reputation, lead product and marketing team to achieve the bank targets.
-	Allocate team and resources in coordination with other departments to meet the bank target set.
-	Create and implement marketing and sales-related reporting, including, inter alia, daily, weekly and monthly marketing report as well as growth pipeline.
-	Increase the bank’s brand awareness on social media (Facebooks, Website, Telegram, LinkedIn, ……etc) according to the bank’s strategic plan. 
-	Build and develop the bank’s brand awareness in local communities.
-	Create, implement and evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
-	Understand market trends and requirements, and clearly report to management.
-	Develop the bank’s online portal for loan product to be more user friendly, launch appropriated marketing campaign to right target customers and propose effective media communication specially through digital marketing.
-	Conduct research on competitor’s activities, the bank’s brand awareness and brand equity to set up proper marketing strategies.
-	Build marketing plan and marketing budget with detail action plan based on sales seasonality to ensure 100% reach monthly, quarterly and yearly target sales.
-	Build win and the long run tactical and strategic planning to reach sales target as set by CEO and relevant department.
-	Strengthen and build relationships with the bank’s network through Customer Relationship Management (CRM) campaigns such as promotion, reward program, etc.

* Research and product development: 

-	Gather data on competitors and analyze their strategies, customer service and lending policies.
-	Monitor the market and review the existing products continuously.
-	Identify market opportunities and other related forms.

* Team building and professional development:

-	Develop and implement client strategies in conjunction with product partners and relevant parties to identify the right product and service opportunities.
-	Proactively developing and maintaining a detailed understanding of the client’s business and financial needs (account planning).
-	Conduct training sessions for marketing team on marketing campaigns, new products, market techniques, sales, …..etc.
-	Lead and develop the marketing team to ensure their professional growth.
-	 Other tasks will be assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
-	Holding a bachelor’s degree in sale & marketing or related field. 
-	At least 5 years of banking experience in business banking and marketing environment.
-	Strong focus on marketing plan and business development, relationship building and networking.
-	Good verbal and written communication skill in English, and Khmer.
-	Sound understanding of the bank product and process
-	Understanding of the full range of transactional & lending products to meet customer needs
-	Experience in the delivery of tasks requiring pro-activeness, activeness, sound judgement, and the ability to solve problems
-	Focus on the customer perspective, deliver result and exercises and sound judgement.
-	Ability to understand loan marketing and branding management. 
-	Proven ability to establish credibility and maintain and develop good business relationships with high profile suppliers and customers.
-	Strong leadership skills with demonstrated ability to manage diverse groups of staff with flexibility, innovation and diplomacy.
-	Work independently and good working relationship with other stakeholders.
-	Good computing skills (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email and Internet).
-	A willingness to operate in a complex, matrix environment with multiple, often conflicting demands.
-	Flexible with the ability to assimilate quickly into a demanding role/environment.
-	Able to work with internal team, third parties and regulators.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  092 799 696 / 085 201 904 / 078 780 884 recruit@ccu-bank.com #15, St Monivong, Sangkat Boeung Trabek, Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh 092 799 696 / 085 201 904 / 078 780 884

Job Description:
Leadership/Supervisory Role: 

Plays a primary role of leading the training and development department and providing direction to management and personnel. Head of Training & Development imparts HR and training support systems to the department, enabling them to better execute their duties by sharpening their skills, also assesses and effects changes in the training team’s structure in order to meet the business’s growth goals.
The Head of Training and Development, in this capacity, provides direction and development of lasting leadership development programs within the business. In his leadership position, it is also the Head of Training and Development to ensure that programs meet deadlines and that they are completed within the allocated budgets.
The Head of Training and Development additionally directs training and development processes ensuring all new hires receive high-quality orientation and on-boarding experiences in order to maintain a high employee performance level. The Head of Training and Development also plays a mentorship role to key training personnel, assisting in the execution of their duties upon request, honing their skills, and getting them ready for the occupation of his position.

* Strategy: 

The Head of Training and Development plays a lead strategic role, overseeing the creation of content, e-learning, collateral and other training materials that will impact behavior-changing training using various training theories inclusive of job aids, facilitator and participant guides, on-the-job training systems, tutorials, and demonstration models.

In this capacity, the Head of Training and Development also drives the development of programs that incorporate overall business objectives such as the business’s financial goals. He also develops and maintains interactive learning solutions that drive measurable results for the business and guarantee that those solutions are instructionally sound and are up to the business’s quality standards.

* Collaboration: 

The Head of Training and Development also plays a highly collaborative role where he builds solid cross-functional relationships with departmental heads and management across the business. He partners with other human resource department heads and senior training and development management in order to determine program priorities, roll-out plans, set program deadlines, and ROI analytics.
The Head of Training and Development also collaborates with departmental heads and managers, in order to identify areas that requiring training and also to develop program requirements unique to each department. He also works closely with key stakeholders in addressing gaps in the overall training mission.

* Analytics: 

The Head of Training and Development also plays an analytical role where he conducts current and ongoing strategic assessments of business-wide training and development programs and initiatives. In this capacity, he is tasked with the creation of testing and evaluation processes of the effectiveness of training programs.
The Head of Training and Development measures program delivery quality, which ensures continuous improvement, maintenance, and adjustment in program delivery approaches accordingly in order to maintain pace with business growth.
Finally, in this capacity, the Head of Training and Development reports results to Chief Operation Officer and key stakeholders for further and strategic decision making and to influence informed decision making.

* Knowledge: 

The Head of Training and Development is also responsible for maintaining knowledge in the department, keeping it up to date with the latest training practices, trends, and technology. The Head of Training and Development models best practices in training and development activities in order to ensure maintenance of top notch training programs, which implies top notch performance.

* Other Duties: 

The Head of Training and Development also performs similar duties as he deems fit for the proper execution of the duties and duties delegated by the Chief Operation Officer, or the Employer.
Job Requirement:
-	Holding a bachelor’s degree in Hunan Resources Management/Education or related field. 
-	At least 5 years of working experience in financial services and 3 years experience as management.
-	Good verbal and written communication skill in English, and other languages is a plus.
-	Focus on the employee training and development, deliver result and exercises and sound judgement.
-	Work independently and good working relationship with other stakeholders.
-	Good computing skills (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email and Internet).
-	A willingness to operate in a complex, matrix environment with multiple, often conflicting demands.
-	Flexible with the ability to assimilate quickly into a demanding role/environment.

*Experience Profile

Summarize the pre-requisite skills and knowledge required to perform this position, as well as any formal qualifications or training needed.

Job Description:
- To manage, control and regulate effectively as also efficiently the Bank's funds and ensure that the liquidity position of the Bank is sound and optimally cost effective as also requirements of funds are readily met for ongoing operational and capital investment requirements;
- To closely monitor and oversee the dealing room and foreign exchange/money position of the dealers, within the approved risk parameters of the Bank;
- To forecast cash flow positions, related borrowing needs, and available funds for investment, and prudently use hedging to mitigate financial risks related to the interest rates on the Bank's borrowings, as well as on its foreign exchange positions
- To drive and achieve target of trading / investment and Corporate treasury sales and achieve maximization of Profits through Fund Management and Trading in various instruments as also Corporate Sales in merchant trades of forex and other instruments.
- To closely monitor the statutory requirements of the Bank as also adhere to statutory guidelines issued from time to time.
- To put in place a system of policies and procedures that impose an adequate level of control over treasury activities, and function in conjunction to various guidelines/policies on Market Risk, Corporate Credit, Corporate Investment, Derivative policy of the Bank
- To maintain excellent working relationship with investment community, credit rating agencies, inter-bank counter parties.
- Act as Treasury advisor to the Bank and apprise the top management of the significant aspects impacting treasury management of the Bank.
- Train new recruits to strengthen the practice of internal procedures and regulations
- Perform other tasks as assigned by senior management.
Job Requirement:

-Proficiency in English Communication skills with Cambodian nationality, and other languages is a plus.
-D16Professional requirements: Treasury Management as well as Business Management in banking experiences, business management and other related majors.

-At least 5 years’ experience in a similar position with Banking, MFIs and other.
-High integrity, fast learner, and adaptability.
-Possess good professional ethics and rigorous work attitude.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
•	To oversee Workshop daily operations 
•	To make maintenance plan for all possessive trucks for Batching Plant to maintain healthy and good condition of all trucks and machinery
•	Perform routine maintenance on trucks, such as checking batteries and changing oil to ensure proper vehicle running
•	Inspect various parts of trucks, including brake systems, wheel bearings and steering mechanisms to ensure they are in the proper condition to operate effectively
•	Use different tools and equipment, such as pressure gauges, pneumatic wrenches, welding equipment, screwdrivers, hoists and jacks, to repair trucks while constantly utilizing safety precautions
•	Diagnose malfunctions in defective equipment by inspecting and testing using devises such as motor analyzers, handheld computers and chassis charts to determine how to address problems
•	Test drive vehicles to ensure they are running properly and to find issues to determine what the solution will be
•	Replace parts, valves, bearings and gears as needed and repair vehicle cooling and heating systems
•	Measure vehicle emissions to ensure they are in the proper limits
•	Ensure parts conform to factory specifications by inspecting and verifying clearances and dimensions
•	Inspect engines and other machinery to determine repairs to complete, creating detailed reports to facilitate work scheduling
•	Interact with customers and provide them with an explanation of required work and an estimation of the cost
•	Complete repairs and replace malfunctioning parts to return working operation to truck components
•	Test trucks to ensure they are in perfectly safe condition to return to customers
Job Requirement:
Qualifications Requirement:
•	Must have completed standard mechanic certification program
•	Two years of experience working as a mechanic required, four years preferred
•	Good physical strength, grip strength, dexterity, flexibility and endurance
•	Critical thinking, analysis and evaluation abilities

Job Description:
Duties of the Senior Talent Acquisition Officer will be responsible as the following:
1. Recruitment & Selection (Staff and Worker at TIA)
▪ Manage staff/worker recruitment requests from each department.
▪ Hire both internal & external to fulfill the vacancy as operation needs 
▪ Coordinate recruitment process with all departments 
▪ Build applicant sources (talent pool) and perform sourcing through offline or online channels to fill  open positions and anticipate future needs
▪ Make an appointment with the candidate for an interview with the recruitment committee
▪ Researching the New potential job Announcement website 
▪ Prepare job analysis 
▪ Identify and approach suitable candidates
▪ Manage references with candidates who accepted the offer 
▪ Brief candidates about responsibilities, salary, and benefits
▪ Ensure that all new hires have proper documents and approval support.
▪ Draft proposal for hiring offer candidates 
▪ Doing TA reports Daily, Weekly Monthly,
▪ Maintain good relationships with colleagues, job fairs, and related partners as part of recruiting.
▪ Propose sourcing and employer branding techniques to promote employer branding and support  recruitment
▪ Verified candidates blacklist with related Dept
▪ Recruitment Tracking List Report 
▪ Other tasks assigned by the Line Supervisor

- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management, or a related field.
- At least 1 -3 years of experience in recruitment,
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills and strong
negotiation and presentation skills.
- Intermediate to advanced proficiency in MS Office Suite
(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook)

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Requirement: Job Requirements•	Degree in Business Management, ICT or related fields•	At least 5 year experience in VAS, Contents and product development  in Telecom or Financial industry  •	Broaden Knowledge in financial services such as Visa Card, Master Card, Alipay or Merchant POS•	Strong understanding of digital marketing and websites•	English proficient•	Computer literate( Ms. Office)•	Be Innovative, dynamic and confident

Job Requirement: Job Requirements•	Degree in Business Management, accounting or finance•	At least 5 years’ experience in sales operation, reporting management and other sales performance •	Technology-savvy with a deep understanding of data analytics tools•	Knowledge on sales acumen, sales operation and process as well as reporting•	Attention to detail and result driven•	Critical thinking and problem solving•	English proficiency•	Dynamic, innovative, and able to work independently.
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Description:
- Manage and control import and export and logistics related works. 
- Handle all issue related to shipping consignment, local clearance, issue with custom 
- Ensure project owner’s satisfactory toward the whole shipping arrangement process and within time frame. 
- Apply cost saving and time consuming in all logistics arrangement. 
- Control the process of faulty equipment sending to repair and return back from repair.
- To minimize the loss during transportation, control overdue period and proper tracking record.  
- Maintain confidentiality of all technical shipping arrangement, both documents and soft correspondence. 
- Communicate with oversea supplier, ensure that all shipping term and shipment mode are correctly applied.  
- Communicate with supplier to comply with designed logistics’ procedure, ensure all documents are correct prior confirmation to supplier.  
- Ensure importing equipment are matched with master list utilization and complied with TRC requirement.
Job Requirement:
- BBA in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management or Management 
- Good management  and  interpersonal skill 
- At least 3 years experiences in shipping and logistics. 
- Computer literacy  and other application is a plus 
- Good English proficiency and numbering skills

Company Profile:
Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

yes has partnered with top global brands like YouTube, Facebook, Google, top OEMs like Apple, Samsung, Hauwei, Xiaomi, Vivo and Oppo, and top payment partners like Alipay, WeChat Pay, Union Pay, VISA and MasterCard to bring exclusive experience for our customers.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
The Channel Marketing Executive role will assist in planning, executing, & monitoring to drive below the line marketing activities (including trade & offline activation) and managing POSM & Premium to drive our brand awareness to be on the top of consumer mind and position our brand as an aspiration leading mineral water brand. He/She works closely with corporate activation agencies to drive our channel marketing campaign to ensure successful execution of our marketing plan.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
● Liasion with all corporate activation agencies to ensure full set up of channel marketing activation in the field (including all below the line activities: roadshow/activation, trade fair, food fair, event exhibition, off-line CSR activation, Key dealer loyalty program, baby store & maternity lunch & learn activation & sampling, booth sampling)
● Ensure events and activations implemented productively to deliver activation campaign result as expected
● Assist in planning, executing, & monitoring to drive below the line marketing activities (including trade & offline channel marketing activation)
● Working closely with activation agencies to manage part-time brand promoters to conduct Lunch and learn activation program to drive brand awareness
● Set up regular schedule to monitor activation campaign at related outlets
● Manage and report POSM & Premium stock, allocation and tracking (e.g. shelf displays, banners, posters, flyers, premium gift,… etc)
● Always keep an eye to report competitors channel marketing activities and weekly report to marketing manager
● Work closely with procurement to find suppliers for POSM & Premium Production
● Assist to manage channel/trade marketing budget spending tracking plan Vs actual spend
● Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor degree in Marketing or any related field
● 2-3 experiences in channel/trade marketing
● Proficient in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel, Outlook
● Good in English communication and writing
● Ability to communicate well and coordinate with interramal and external stakeholders
● Teamwork spirit, open minded and willing to learn and shre
● Ability to work independently and under pressure.

** Salary & other Benefit
● Salary: Negotiation
● Working hour: Mon-Sat
● Day Off: Sunday
● Public Holiday & Annual Leave is Complied with labor law
● Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
● Training & Development
● Insurance

** Interested Candidates, Please sent your CV & Current Photo and expected salary to Email: recruitment@dpnvgroup.com
- Phone Number: 010 456 719 / 023 99 1234
- Address: Lum Street, Toul Roka III Village, Sangat Chak Angre Krom, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh.
Company Profile:
DPNV is a new proudly Cambodian FMCG company which will soon launch its natural products.

Our company is organized around 3 main divisions:
- Production with our water plant in Kampong Speu province at the foothills of Mount Aoral,
- Trade and Business support with our headquarter and facilities in Phnom Penh.

Join our dynamic team and be part of a new success story where human knowledge serves the force of nature.

Job Description:
Review and analyze system specifications
Design and execute automated and manual tests to validate the applications and systems
Ensure proper test coverage and will test features to ensure they are properly built
Create logs to document testing phases and defects
Report bugs and errors to development teams
Help troubleshoot issues
Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing

Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the development lifecycle

Working knowledge of testing principles and methodology
Good command of both written and spoken English
Ability to document and troubleshoot errors
Should be highly proficient at debugging issues
Experience in API testing, Mobile Testing, and Web Testing
Proficient in writing Web and API automated tests
Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
Good command of both written and spoken English
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017 888 349

Job Description:
Build effective visualizations to communicate data to key decision-makers
Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports

Improve business performance by identifying sources of growth, pinpointing issues
Locate and define new process improvement opportunities
Training end-users on new reports and dashboards
Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing
Locate and define new process improvement opportunities
Job Requirement:
At least 1+ years of experience as Business & Data Analyst
Expertise in Power BI, Python, SQL, Microsoft Office: PowerPoint, Excel, Word
Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc), databases (SQL etc), programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks)
Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc)
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
Ability and experience in extracting insights from data, and summarizing learning/takeaways
Good command of both written and spoken English
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
The Channel Marketing Executive role will assist in planning, executing, & monitoring to drive below the line marketing activities (including trade & offline activation) and managing POSM & Premium to drive our brand awareness to be on the top of consumer mind and position our brand as an aspiration leading mineral water brand. He/She works closely with corporate activation agencies to drive our channel marketing campaign to ensure successful execution of our marketing plan.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
● Liasion with all corporate activation agencies to ensure full set up of channel marketing activation in the field (including all below the line activities: roadshow/activation, trade fair, food fair, event exhibition, off-line CSR activation, Key dealer loyalty program, baby store & maternity lunch & learn activation & sampling, booth sampling)
● Ensure events and activations implemented productively to deliver activation campaign result as expected
● Assist in planning, executing, & monitoring to drive below the line marketing activities (including trade & offline channel marketing activation)
● Working closely with activation agencies to manage part-time brand promoters to conduct Lunch and learn activation program to drive brand awareness
● Set up regular schedule to monitor activation campaign at related outlets
● Manage and report POSM & Premium stock, allocation and tracking (e.g. shelf displays, banners, posters, flyers, premium gift,… etc)
● Always keep an eye to report competitors channel marketing activities and weekly report to marketing manager
● Work closely with procurement to find suppliers for POSM & Premium Production
● Assist to manage channel/trade marketing budget spending tracking plan Vs actual spend
● Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor degree in Marketing or any related field
● 2-3 experiences in channel/trade marketing
● Proficient in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel, Outlook
● Good in English communication and writing
● Ability to communicate well and coordinate with interramal and external stakeholders
● Teamwork spirit, open minded and willing to learn and shre
● Ability to work independently and under pressure.

** Salary & other Benefit
● Salary: Negotiation
● Working hour: Mon-Sat
● Day Off: Sunday
● Public Holiday & Annual Leave is Complied with labor law
● Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
● Training & Development
● Insurance

Job Description:
**JOB PURPOSE: Welcome all the clients in a pleasant manner and complete a variety of front desk tasks, such as taking phone calls, answering to questions, booking appointments, payments and keeping the reception area clean and well-organized.
**Responsibilities and Duties:
• Be humility, patience, acceptance 
● Attend and actively participate in trainings to learn about a variety of topics related to personal, and professional growth, as well as policies and procedures.
• Complete daily and weekly receptionist duties, achieving the high reception standards of Go Gym, as assigned. This may include, but is not limited to:
• Greet and welcome guests as soon as they arrive at the gym with smile
• Monitor hygiene, cleanliness, and comfortable environment in the front office
• Be familiar with property safety, first aid and fire and emergency procedures and enforce these within the gym.
• Class booking reservation and supplies inventory
• Answer, screen and forward incoming phone calls
• Ensure reception area is tidy and presentable, with all necessary stationery and material (e.g. pens, forms and brochures)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
People Leadership:
• Effective performance management of all direct reports, focusing on behavioral change that will both inspire and motivate individuals to deliver results.
• Responsible for the quality of maintenance work carried out by all indirect employees
• Develop a behavioral safety culture and promote a safe working environment by ensuring full compliance with Carlsberg SH&E and LOTO policy process.
• Recruit, lead, motivate and develop a flexible and agile multi-disciplined maintenance team.
• Carry out leadership led process confirmations, maximizing the opportunity to coach and engage teams during the process.
• Actively support other members of the Senior Management Team
Budgeting & Improvements:
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual maintenance budgets
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual utilities budgets
• Review maintenance practices, successes & failures with the objective of constantly moving the improvement of cost and performance.
• Analyze and review utilities consumption with the aim of constantly improving supply and operational consumption
• Actively participate in the site/country long term development plan (LDP) formation
• Identify and prepare capital projects for approval and in line with the LDP, which improve operational efficiencies and product profitability.
• Support and where required take the role in managing material and non-material waste and loss reduction, with cross-functional teams.
• Encourage and actively support standardized problem-solving methodologies, including Gemba Kaizen, RCA & EWO activities, to resolve day-to-day and chronic problems.
Performance:
• Prioritize maintenance and utility focus areas
• Ensure clear focus and communication of initiatives that relate to overall business and site targets, through effective policy deployment
• Ensure sufficient resource is allocated to key initiatives (internal or external)
• Drive correct target percentage compliance of autonomous/preventative maintenance through maintenance and operational teams.
• Utilize machine reliability measures of MTBF / MTTR for effective maintenance approaches with defined machine criticality view.
• Sets and communicate clear targets for team
• Ensure utilities consumption targets are part of each operational team targets and that operational teams have a concrete plan to improve
• Review performance through a structured MCRS and PMS system
• Be discipline in terms of meeting attendance and management of these meetings
• Ensure meeting TORs are agreed and adhered to and the plans and action logs are always reviewed according to schedule
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

1. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities KPI and the functional levers relating to people, cost, quality, and service
2. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities within a brewing and packaging environment.
3. In depth knowledge of regulatory requirements relating to Utilities.
4. Committed to Lean TPM and acts as role model in order to achieve organizational objectives through sustainable continuous improvements.
5. High level of Carlsberg leadership competencies:
• Driving for Results
• Customer/Consumer Focus
• Passion and integrity
• Analytical thinking
• Cross-team interacting and

Minimum Qualification Requirement:
1. Qualified to degree level or equivalent in Engineering, Maintenance and/or Utilities or have significant experience and a proven long-term record of managing maintenance and utilities with an FMCG company
2. Knowledge and experience of applying Lean TPM philosophies, tools, and techniques.
3. Knowledge of key

Job Description:
1. Scope of work:
The Senior Accountant is working with and supporting Chief Accountant and company management on financial analysis and accounting matters such as revenue collection, financial planning, reporting, and reviewing operational and team performance.

2. Main duties & Responsibilities:
• Monitor cash flows and manage revenue collection efforts including working partner banks on housing loan to clients.
• Prepare company’s financial and accounting reports and conducting reviews and evaluations for improving revenue collection as well as cost-reduction opportunities
• Prepare and declare monthly and yearly tax declaration
• Produce accurate financial reports to specific deadlines
• Keep abreast of changes in financial and tax regulations
• Prepare financial statements, company’s budget, business activity reports, and forecasts
• Oversee operations of the finance and accounting department, set goals and objectives, and design action plan for these especially revenue collection targets to be met.
• Control financial position, performance, cash flow and budgeting within the entity.
• Prepare and manage financial transactions, ie. AP, AR, and inventory control.
• Support and lead team on AR follow up and revenue collection
• Any other tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & Requirements:
• A degree in Accounting, Finance, Economic or other relevant field
• At least 3 years of working experience preferably in real estate sector
• Extensive understanding of financial trends both within the company and general market patterns
• Computer literacy in MS. Office, Internet and Email, Finance or Accounting Software;
• Be able to guide and lead employees to ensure appropriate financial processes are being used
• Be willing to take new challenges and learn new things
• Solid understanding of financial statistics and accounting principles
• Knowledge of all statutory legislation and regulations particularly on tax issues
• Good in speaking and writing both English and Khmer
• Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
• Strong attention to detail and excellent organizational skills
• Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility
• Be able to lead and motivate others.

4. Working Days and Hours:
– Monday to half Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00am & 1:30pm to 5:30pm
– Lunch time: 12:00am to 1:30pm

5. Workplace
Senior Accountant is based at Worldbridge Homes’ HQ at The Bridge Building in Phnom Penh

6. Salary: Negotiable based on experiences

** Contact Person: Interested candidates can send their CVs to below email as soon as possible as the first submission will be reviewed and called for interview first: 
- Mr. Moeun Savon
- Email: om@worldbridgehomes.com.kh
- Tel: +855 17 41 55 05

7. For more information about Worldbridge Homes Co., Ltd., please visit our homepage:
https://www.worldbridge.com.kh/portfolio/worldbridge-homes/

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

job title: Officer, Talent Acquisition (at One More Restaurant)
company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
position: Officer, Talent Acquisition (at One More Restaurant)
Job Description:
1. Execute recruitment and consolidate staff requisitions from all functions and incorporated into recruitment plan to ensure the vacancies are timely fulfilled.
2. Build applicant sources (talent pool) and perform sourcing through offline or online channels to fill open positions and anticipate future needs
3. Prepare job announcements through various recruitment platforms both virtual and off-line channels to acquire potential candidates. 
4. Shortlist candidates following job requirements and implement recruitment process to ensure potential talents are selected
5. Acquire and maintain all necessary documents from employees (CV, academic and employment records, national ID, family book, guarantee letter, medical health checkup, employee book etc…)
6. Record and update employee’s information in HRIS system to ensure that employee data are up-to-date and ready to use
7. Implement onboarding program to ensure that inductions are effectively conducted   
8. Propose sourcing and employer branding techniques to promote employer branding and support recruitment
9. Other talks assigned by superiors
Job Requirement: 1. Education: o Bachelor Degree of Business Administrative or equivalent2. Experiences: o 1-2 years of experiences in recruitment or overall HR practiceso Fresh graduate is recommended to apply3. Skills and knowledge: o Knowledge in Cambodia Labor Lawo Have strong talent networkso Be digitalized orientedo Good communication and report presentationo Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o Language: Strong command both Khmer and English
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

Job Description:
-	Design and implement safety measures and data recovery plans
-	Ensure the awareness and training of Information security policy , Dos & Don'ts to all personnel
-	Carrying out all processes resulting from the implementation of the information security policy in conjunction with compliance with the policy.
-	Relaying all relevant information to concerned departments for processes and tasks concerning the information security policy and breach
-	Ensure no company confidential data is leaked outside of the company via. Any media (email, internet, social media or other communication tool)
-	Monitor the VPN/database access and system audit Monitor VPN/database, Log files, access to database, intrusion detection & intrusion prevention system, Firewall, Mail Security, etc. logs to ensure legitimate access to systems / company data
-	Manage and ensure anti-virus server and clients is up-to-date including proxy server.
-	Manage patch management and hot fix security
-	Manage and keep monitoring on Company's network, system security and server’s permission
-	Update the guideline and instruction to improve the implementation.
-	Assess vulnerability on Network, System and database and apply the efficiency control to mitigate risk 
-	Stay up-to-date on information technology trends and security standard.
-	Analyses and determine mobile product security requirements.
-	Sundry project duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
-	Education: Bachelor degree in computer science, technology or related fields;
-	Experience: At least 2 years’ experience in Server Management with Window, Linux and Virtualization, Database and Network Administration and Security, Preferably in a local Bank/MFI. 
-	Experience: with computer network penetration testing and techniques.
-	Understanding of firewalls, proxies, SIEM, antivirus, and IDPS concepts.
-	Understanding of patch management with the ability to deploy patches in a timely manner while understanding business impact.
-	Language: be high proficiency in English: listening, speaking, reading, and writing;
-	Computer literacy: MS office, MS Outlook or Other system for business operation.
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Nhong Korane  070 960 666 job@chamroeun.com #425, St. 271, Sangkat Toul Tompong II, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 960 666

Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org Kampong Chhnang  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Job Description:
To oversee cost management for our entire company. In this role, will work collaboratively with various to analyze costs, assess vendor relationships, and maximize profit.

* Work under the guidance of the Purchasing Supervisor.    

REPORTING LINE:
Reports directly to Purchasing Supervisor.  

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
* RECIEVING:
- Receive the product/ Goods from suppliers
- Prepare the product ingredient/ goods to the outlet
- Keep and record of receiving/ sending out product/ goods 

* COST CONTROL:
- Reviews acquisition requests to see if valid or warranted acquisition or purchase
- Evaluates the completeness of the requests and that all paperwork is accurately completed
- Assists departments / outlets with requisition exception process
- Determines if asset is in stock or must be acquired
- Manages quote, purchase order, and exception activities
- Coordinates purchase orders with Purchasing and Suppliers (if required)
- Reconciles purchase order and receiving record
- Reconciles procurement, shipping, and pricing variances if required
- Provides the Account Departments with confirmation of receipt (for example, asset, service, disconnect, and so on)
- Co-ordinate and control asset management in the Department or Company to ensure that correct Company policies and procedures are adhered with regards to asset management and to ensure the safekeeping of the Company’s assets. 
- Ensure strict compliance with regards to Company’s policies and procedures on procurement/purchasing, control and recording etc.
- Assists in costing functions or reports as and when assigned by immediate superior or HOD.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance required.
- 3+ years of accounting experience.
- Working knowledge of tax laws and GAAP.
- Strong financial analysis skills.
- Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Strong organizational and stress management skills.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office, particularly with Excel.
- Ability to train and manage staff.
- Ability to work with little to no supervision.

* CONFIDENTIALITY 
RESTRICTION ON PRESS RELEASE AND PUBLIC STATEMENTS 
- To ensure that no press releases or public statements are made without the prior consent of CEO  

* DIVULGING COMPANY INFORMATION 
- The incumbent will not (either during or after his/her employment), without the Management’s written consent, divulge any information concerning the associated companies or any of their dealings, transactions or affairs which may come to the incumbent’s knowledge during or in the course of his/her employment with the company. 

* JOB DESCRIPTION
- To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. 

* MEASURES OF GOOD PERFORMANCE
- Revenue targets achieved 
- Job knowledge
- Product knowledge
- Number of accounts 
- Effective communication- internal & external 
- Appearance 
- Punctuality 
- Attendance
