Job Description: •    Issue sales ordered, delivery note and invoices in system.•    Issue PR, memos, and quotation.•    Make revenue update for sales team.•    Prepare daily sales invoices.•    Communicate with customers.•    Perform tasks and paperwork for sales department.•    Review DN and INV relevant Sales & Marketing.•    Manage and prepare quotation & PR General Worker …etc.•    Coordinate and follow-through with Purchasing, Accounting, Sales team, and Warehouse.•    Communication with Sales department and work closely for related information of issuing SOs, quote…etc.•    Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: •    Bachelor’s degree in major Sales & Marketing or Equivalent•    At least 2 years experiences in relevant functions•    Fundamental comprehension in Constructions; fast learning and initiative to go above and beyond are crucial•    Good Command in English and Khmer is essential, Chinese is a plus•    Proficiency in Microsoft Office 365 especially MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Teams•    Possess high level of Integrity, Confident, Determined and Ambitious.Competitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch Allowance•	Coffee serve•	Group Personal Accident Insurance (Forte)•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance (NSSF)•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  010-484-535 /092-484-535 recruitment@isisteel.com.kh Phum Tropang Thloeung, St,Veng Sreng ,Sangkat Chaom Chao, Khan Phor Sen Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010-484-535 /092-484-535

Job Description: •	Drive the sales to achieve the individual sales target in your own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of customers, revenue, sales growth, availability, visibility, and customer price of products are achieved within the area.•	Manage the implementation of brand, trade, and sales area programs and localized activities.•	Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximize revenues, clients, and share performance.•	Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely retailers, wholesalers, depots, craftsmen, and roll-formers, in order to gain a high level of support and loyalty.•	Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with retailer, wholesaler, depot, craftsman, and roll former to provide on-job coaching and motivate to drive achievement of targets.•	Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decisions and planning.•	Ensure all area activities are compiled to ISI Steel's code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.•	Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.•	Other tasks as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business management, civil engineering or architecture, or equivalent•	Minimum 2 year of experience in territory sales representative level in construction material•	Fresh graduate students of civil engineering or architecture are also encouraged to apply.•	Good command of English (Speaking & Writing)•	Good Chinese is a plus.•	Ability to use MS Office, Internet, and E-mail•	Outgoing, flexible, patient, and dedicatedCompetitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch Allowance•	Coffee and fruit serve•	Group Personal Accident Insurance ( Forte )•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance ( NSSF )•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Job Description: • Provide a good steel design that can have vales to all concerned parties• Advise sales, site people, contractors, customers, suppliers with the best knowledge in Engineering to ensure the work can be done and safely• Always step up to the design solution with the right Code and regulations to ensure the work can be done based on the codes and regulations• Advise the concerned parties if found any unsafety working either at the office, the site, or the factory• Develop and design procedures to ensure systems and workflow are corrected and traceable• Provide Engineering Training to the concerned designs and draftsman staff promptly• Always monitor Work KPIs weekly and monthly. Job Description:
- Perform regular branches and head office audit.

Job Description:
-	Participate in writing/updating IT policy/security system procedures/guidelines/policies.
- Involve in preparing, testing and update Business contingency plan with disaster recovery procedures (DRP).
- Awareness of internal policies and other legal requirements and update on time all any inactive actions.
-	Research and self-improve knowledge about IT security and searching for seminars/courses for improving skills.
-	Participate in the assessment of the training needs. coordinate, direct and participate in the training/refresh (branch users) in the uses of software.
Understand and perform IT Security Risk Assessments.
- Join in the development and effective maintenance of the ISO 27001:2013 certification and related Information Security Management System (ISMS).
- Participate in the periodic Vulnerability Assessments and Penetration Testing are performed on corporate infrastructure to ensure security of same.
- Review and report all IT security systems and other network activities.
- Monitor and review the user profiles from all system to be standardized.
- Participate in monitoring physical security of IT premises, compliance with IT security policy, procedure with other third parties and server room.
-	Review and monitor all security, wireless, DHCP, BYOD devices to make sure it is in good condition.
- Check and control to log file and data information to make it is safe and usable.
- Participate in all IT audits and help deputy head of IT with required documentation.
- Participate to scan and review security vulnerabilities of software before recommending for Systems team to install on user PC/laptops.
- Participate to work closely with group IT Security team to ensure LOLC (Cambodia) Systems and Network is up to highest security standards.

* Deadline: Apr 05, 2023
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or related fields.
-	Minimum of 1 year of experience in IT/IS Security and preferably in MFI or banking or related sector.
-	Experience in an information security role is advantage.
-	Willing to learn and certification on ISO 27001:2013 internal auditor 
-	Willing to learn and certification on CEH or CISA is a definite advantage 
- Strong understanding of HW, SW, OS, virtualization, LAN/WAN, Storage.
- 	Understanding of Data Encryption for internal and external network.
-	Excellent knowledge of security incidents/intrusions, information technology systems and IT & information security, both theory and practice.
-	Excellent understanding of security issues, problems, utilities, techniques and solutions.
- Solid knowledge of various information security frameworks.
- Good communication skill and strong skills in monitoring and troubleshooting.
- Fluency in written and oral English.
- Ability to educate a non-technical audience about various security measures.
- Ability to work under pressure.
- Ability to work independently or as a team member.

job title: មន្រ្តីដោះស្រាយបំណុល​
position: មន្រ្តីដោះស្រាយបំណុល​
Job Description:
 ធ្វើការវិភាគអំពីស្ថានភាពប្រតិបត្តិការ និងតំបន់របស់សាខា ដើម្បីរិះរកយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត និងបង្កើត
គោលនយោបាយ ក្នុងការបង្កើនការប្រមូលត្រឡប់នូវបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ។
 រៀបចំផែនការប្រមូលប្រចាំខែ ដោយមានការអនុម័តពីប្រធានផ្នែកដោះស្រាយបំណុល។
 ជួយមន្រ្តីដោះស្រាយបំណុលនៅតាមសាខា ដើម្បីរៀបចំឯកសារផ្លូវច្បាប់ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃ
កិច្ចសន្យាសងប្រាក់រវាងអតិថិជន និងសាខា។
 រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍បញ្ហា ឬសគល់នៃបញ្ហា និងផ្តល់អនុសាសន៍សម្រាប់ផែនការដោះស្រាយ បំណុល
ដើម្បីពិភាក្សាជាមួយនាយក/នាយិកាសាខាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
 រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រមូលបំណុល និងស្ថានភាពបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវនៅតាមសាខានីមួយៗ
និងផ្ញើជូនប្រធានផ្នែកដោះស្រាយបំណុលរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃទី០៥ នៃខែបន្ទាប់។
 ជួយបង្កើតផែនការដោះស្រាយបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ជី។
 បង្កើតទម្រង់តាមដានការសងបំណុលត្រឡប់ ឬកិច្ចសន្យាជម្រះបំណុល។
 ប្រមូលរបាយការណ៍ពីសាខា និងរាយការណ៍ជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងអំពីព័ត៌មានពាក់ព័ន្ធ នឹងគណនី
បំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ។
 សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយមេធាវីក្រុមហ៊ុនក្នុងការរៀបចំកិច្ចការរដ្ឋបាលផ្នែកច្បាប់។
Job Requirement:
 មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
 ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍បម្រើការងារជាមួយគ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុយ៉ាងហោចពីរឆ្នាំ។
 ចេះវិភាគរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងរបាយការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការដែលរួមមានកាលវិភាគបង់ប្រាក់
និងរបាយការណ៍ស្ថានភាពបំណុល។
 មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកច្បាប់ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុនិងធនាគារ និងច្បាប់កិច្ចសន្យារបស់ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។
 ចេះប្រើកុំព្យូទ័រស្ទាត់ជំនាញ (Microsoft word and Excel)
 មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង ពូកែសង្កេតអាកប្បកិរិយារបស់មនុស្ស និងមានជំនាញបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូល។

Job Description:
- Build and lead to growth LOLC’s merchant base through new merchant partnerships, identifying the growth sectors and renewing the existing relationships.
- Develop ideas for merchant campaigns, managing campaigns process and execution.
- Handle all merchants proposed to create from customer including briefing the benefit of merchant and condition, verify agreement, merchant registration, create merchant in iPay portal, and verify and send QR Code to merchants.
- End to end responsibility for merchant performance growth and acting as the lead for the vertical.
- Work closely with merchants and marketing department to initiate and develop the effective promotional materials to promote iPay services and other financial services and ensuring that the merchant operation is running smoothly and effectively.
-  Working directly with the Branch Manager to actively plan out strategies for business growth and merchant expansion.
- Develop a strategic plan for merchant activities in partnership with other companies and other entities, manage new and existing partners joint campaigns to successfully meet the KPI.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
Organize kitchen operations and prepare and serve a range of dishes, whilst supervising junior members of the Kitchen.

Work under the guidance of the Executive Chef | Sous Chef.    

REPORTING LINE:
Reports directly to Executive Chef | Sous Chef.    

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Prepare in advance food, beverage, material and equipment needed for the service.
- Cook and serve dishes according to the restaurant’s menu.
- Provide direction to the Commis, Cooks, and Stewards, Clean and re-set their working area.  
- In absence of Executive Chef | Sous Chef, conduct shift briefings to ensure restaurant activities and operational requirements are known. 
- Work with Services Manager to ensure the departmental performance of staff is productive. 
- Conduct on the job training in accordance with the departmental standards and procedures and maintain a record of progress for each staff member.
- Provide input for probation and formal performance appraisal discussions in line with company guideline. 
- Ensure new staff attends Corporate Orientation within first month of hire and departmental orientation is completed within first two weeks.
- Coach, counsel and discipline staff in breach of restaurant policies and departmental     procedures, providing constructive feedback to enhance performance.
- Work with superior in the preparation and management of the department’s budget and be aware of financial targets.
- Recycle where-ever possible and enforce cost saving measures to staff.
- Log security incidents and accidents in accordance with hotel requirements.
- Communicate to their superior any difficulties, guest or internal customer comment on and other relevant information.
- Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the company.
Job Requirement:
- Eligible for a working permit in country of hire
- Gastronomic education certificate or equivalent (apprenticeship/diploma/BA/Bsc)
- HACCP certification 
- Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment 
- English – excellent oral and written skills 
- Ability to establish and retain effective working relationships with staff and clients/vendors. 
- Ability to identify and delegate tasks effectively. 
- Excellent organizational and time management skills. 
- Applies a professional, confidential and ethical approach at all times. 
- Works in a safe, prudent and organized manner. 
- Knowledgeable of food safety regulations.

* CONFIDENTIALITY 
RESTRICTION ON PRESS RELEASE AND PUBLIC STATEMENTS 
- To ensure that no press releases or public statements are made without the prior consent of CEO DIVULGING COMPANY INFORMATION 
- The incumbent will not (either during or after his/her employment), without the Management’s written consent, divulge any information concerning the associated companies or any of their dealings, transactions or affairs which may come to the incumbent’s knowledge during or in the course of his/her employment with the company. 

* JOB DESCRIPTION
- To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. 

* MEASURES OF GOOD PERFORMANCE
- Revenue targets achieved 
- Job knowledge
- Product knowledge
- Number of accounts 
- Effective communication- internal & external 
- Appearance 
- Punctuality 
- Attendance

job title: នាយករងសាខា (ទីតាំង៖ សាខាខណ្ឌទួលគោក)
position: នាយករងសាខា (ទីតាំង៖ សាខាខណ្ឌទួលគោក)
Job Description:
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីធ្វើការវាយតម្លៃលទ្ធផលការងាររបស់សាខាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចំាសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែធៀប
និងគោលដៅ។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្ចីមុនពេលធ្វើការអនុម័តដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាគុណភាព
ផលបត្រកម្ចីល្អ។
 ជួយនាយកនាយិកាសាខាដើម្បីដោះស្រាយកម្ចីដែលមានបញ្ហា។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីជួយរៀបចំផែនការការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងផែនការហរិញ្ញវត្ថុដោយរួមមានផែនការ
និងគម្រោងព្យាករណ៍នូវចំនួនដែលត្រូវកំណើនអតិថិជន។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីធ្វើឲ្យប្រាកដថាការផ្តល់កម្ចីបានរៀបចំឯកសារបានល្អ ដោយបានចុះកាលបរិច្ឆេទ
ចុះហត្ថលេខា និងបានត្រួតពិនិត្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទាំងចំនួនដែលបានព្រមព្រាង
និងការសរសេរទិន្នន័យជាអក្សរមុនអនុម័ត។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើឲ្យប្រាកដថាការអនុវត្តការងារមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព
និងស្របតាមច្បាប់គ្រប់កម្រិតទាំងអស់សម្រាប់ប្រព័ន្ធត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យធនធានហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនធានសម្ភារក្នុងសាខា។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីធ្វើការជ្រើសរើស បណ្តុះបណ្តាល លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងវាយតម្លៃបុគ្គលិកក្រោមការ
គ្រប់គ្រង។
 ជួយនាយកសាខាដើម្បីផ្តល់ការតម្រែតម្រង់ទិសដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្មី
និងផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើកាងារ​ទៅបុគ្គលិកក្នុងសាខា។
 ធ្វើជាតំណាងប្រចាំសាខាក្នុងជំនួបប្រជុំ កម្មវិធី និងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា
ឬតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់នាយកសាខា។
Job Requirement:
 មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រ/បរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ក្នុងផ្នែកហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ការគ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារនិងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
 បទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោចណាស់បីឆ្នាំជាមួយស្ថាប័នហិរញ្ញវត្ថុក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រាក់កម្ចី។
 ជំនាញក្នុងការដឹកនាំ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តបុគ្គលិក។
 មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រល្អ។
 មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងសរសេរភាសារអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ។
 មានជំនាញផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ វិភាគ គ្រប់គ្រង និងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។
 មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ និងមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់។
 ជាមនុស្សដែលមានលទ្ធផលការងារល្អ។

Job Description:
The Assistant Manager is someone who is passionate about food and customer service. They are a problem solver with strong work ethic and leadership skills. The Assistant Manager understands that customer satisfaction always takes priority but efficient restaurant operations make it possible. They are experienced leader with a goal to move up in the management field.

** Responsibilities
• Identify and delegate responsibilities to supervisor and staff to ensure objectives are met and excellent service is consistently achieved
• Effectively manage the restaurant in absence of Restaurant Manager
• Manage operations with passion, integrity and knowledge while promoting the culture and values of Stonegrill
• Provide direction to Supervisors and staff to achieve restaurant goals
• Consistently review operations and staff to identify any problems, concerns and opportunities for improvement
• Provide coaching and feedback to mangers and staff and assess performance on and ongoing basis
• Create a positive guest experience by delivering a high level of service and ensuring all staff engage guests to understand their needs and exceed expectations
• Manage the restaurant to meet or exceed in food quality, safety and cleanliness
• Solicit guest feedback to understand the needs and wants of customers
• Train and coach staff on guest services principles and practices
• Monitor and maintain the POS system
• Assist in menu implementation
• Develop and implement creative solutions to areas of improvement

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
2. POSITION PURPOSE
Support and work with the team on developing and implementing IT software solution, in contribution to fulfill business objectives.

3. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES
IT Application Developer is responsible for:
- Analyze the business specs / technical specs of the assigned projects to develop the systems which meet requirement and timing.
- R&D and analyses the feasibility of the IT projects on business / technical aspects, to suggest right alternatives, as well as ensuring quality / functionalities of developed systems meeting company requirement and schedule.
- Investigate and answer daily enquiries on systems functional as well as problem encountered.
- In charge of function test on enhancements / new projects under responsibility to ensure developed modules are
matched with business specs.
- Assist users/team leader on building test scripts to cover all test cases.
Job Requirement:
** Qualification:
- University Graduate, major in Information Technology.

** Experience & Requirement:
- IT software development at least 2 to 5 years.
- Highly experienced back-end languages including C#, ASP.NET, PHP and JAVA
- Highly experience DBMS such as SQL/Oracle and DB2 is advantage.
- Highly experience OOP, MVC/MVP, and API technologies.
- Experience with front-end web technologies such CSS, XML, HTML, Bootstrap, and Angular
- Experience with Agile software development and software development life cycle (SDLC).
- Expertise in developing system architecture
- Experience mobile application (iOS, Android) is advantage.

** Skills:
- Flexible and fast learner
- Good analytical skills and problem solving
- Strong commitment
- Able to work under pressure and multitasking
- Good team player, independent and result-oriented
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Good command of spoken and written English
Company Profile:
We are one of the leading Japanese Life Insurance company with more than 100 years of history in the life insurance industry, with an extensive international business network in various countries around the world.  We are recruiting to add onto our team of pioneers in the operations department to support our business growth in Cambodia.

Job Description:
2. POSITION PURPOSE
Support and work with the team on developing and implementing IT software solution, in contribution to fulfill business objectives.

3. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES
IT Application Developer is responsible for:
- Analyze the business specs / technical specs of the assigned projects to develop the systems which meet requirement and timing.
- R&D and analyses the feasibility of the IT projects on business / technical aspects, to suggest right alternatives, as well as ensuring quality / functionalities of developed systems meeting company requirement and schedule.
- Investigate and answer daily enquiries on systems functional as well as problem encountered.
- In charge of function test on enhancements / new projects under responsibility to ensure developed modules are
matched with business specs.
- Assist users/team leader on building test scripts to cover all test cases.
Job Requirement:
** Qualification:
- University Graduate, major in Information Technology.

** Experience & Requirement:
- IT software development at least 2 to 5 years.
- Highly experienced back-end languages including C#, ASP.NET, PHP and JAVA
- Highly experience DBMS such as SQL/Oracle and DB2 is advantage.
- Highly experience OOP, MVC/MVP, and API technologies.
- Experience with front-end web technologies such CSS, XML, HTML, Bootstrap, and Angular
- Experience with Agile software development and software development life cycle (SDLC).
- Expertise in developing system architecture
- Experience mobile application (iOS, Android) is advantage.

** Skills:
- Flexible and fast learner
- Good analytical skills and problem solving
- Strong commitment
- Able to work under pressure and multitasking
- Good team player, independent and result-oriented
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Good command of spoken and written English
Company Profile:
We are one of the leading Japanese Life Insurance company with more than 100 years of history in the life insurance industry, with an extensive international business network in various countries around the world.  We are recruiting to add onto our team of pioneers in the operations department to support our business growth in Cambodia.

Job Description: Job summary:Execute marketing and promotional activities to help our clients achieve their sales targets and build brand awarenessGeneral responsibilities:• Conduct market situation analysis and market research to support the development of marketing strategies• Conduct financial feasibility studies of advertising and promotional activities to ensure alignment with profit objectives• Analyze and compare costs associated with advertising and promotional activates• Track and update marketing plans and execution status• Prepare all operational briefs and documents for the performance review meetings with clients• Gather general market trends, market share, and competitive information as guidance in gauging the effectiveness of marketing activities• Coordinate and communicate all planned activities to all operational departments and Business Units• Establish close business relationships with media, advertising agents, and industry players• Co-work with respective trade channels for promotional Mechanism, in-store display, and POSM.• Other tasks assigned by the immediate manager
Job Requirement: Functional Skills and knowledge:• Demonstrate a strong understanding of clients' industry/business/products• Demonstrate basic knowledge of principles and methods of marketing strategy, advertising, and promotion• Demonstrate basic knowledge of media production, communication and dissemination techniques and methods• Strong analytical background and knowledge of statistical analysis methods• Demonstrate appreciation and respect for cultural sensitivities, especially in cross-country/-cultural interactions• Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken• Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word, and PowerPoint)Soft skills:• Fast learner, Good Interpersonal Skills, Flexibility, Result and Detail Oriented, Organizational skills, Social Media, and creative mindsetEducation:Bachelor's degree in Business, marketing, public relation or media, or pharmacy.Work experience:Minimum 2 years in the Marketing field.Preferable someone with a social media management background or marketing communication.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information DKSH Cambodia Administration Manager 087800338 jobs.kh@dksh.com No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087800338

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
Operation:

- Ensure and drive smooth and credible sales reporting (Business health, sales volume performance, sales & distributor performance…) & Business Planning Cycle
- Liaise with IIT to use technology to transform raw data into actionable business insights
- Enforce data sanity from trade by challenging the answer to relevant data owners in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution and communicate and drive changes, if necessary, to improve data collection productivity.

Analytical:

- Manipulate & analyse complex, high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources using a variety of tools & data analysis techniques.
- Create projection models & support business owner with the development of assumptions and scenarios.
- Drive cross-functional projects using data modelling and analysis techniques to discover insights that will guide strategic decisions and uncover optimization opportunities.
- Drive to build, develop and maintain sophisticated data models, reporting systems, data visualization, dashboards and performance metrics support that support key business decisions.
- Deliver in-depth analysis on business performance (trends, funnels) and drivers, as well as forecasts & targets.
- Execute findings & identifying problem statement, develop hypothesis & build used cases to get a deep dive study.
- Build predictive model through deploying machine-learning algorithms

Communication:

- Ensure data/ analysis translate for all granular individual level across functions and level in the organization through data visualization techniques.
- Manage clear expectation with business partner and management to drive sales analytics team with clear direction and measurable success factors.
- Ensure successful completion of data insight initiatives through effective management of analyst and data employees and effective collaboration with stakeholders.

Innovation:

- Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach to improve current business practices.
- Anticipate future demands of initiatives related to people, technology, budget and business within your department and design/implement solutions to meet these needs.
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:
- At least 3-5 years of experience in a position monitoring, managing, manipulating, and drawing insights from data, and someone with experience leading a team & multiple large-scale projects.
- Preferred experiences in banking, insurance, telecom, FMCGs, Audit firm, or research – (any in business analyst fields)
- Experience in working with multiple stakeholders and managing expectation.
- Superior in interpersonal and presentation skills.
- Creative and innovative problem-solving skills
- Team oriented, collaborative, diplomatic, and flexible style, with the ability to tailor data driven results to various audience levels
- Intellectual curiosity and a passion for data and analytics
- Strong desire to take initiative; ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives
- Curious and constantly looking for new, practical ways to improve status quo and possess customer-first mindset.
- High learning agility and passionate to drive change.
- Excellent time management and demonstrate ability to multitask and prioritize
- Integrity, flexible, and innovative

Educational / minimum requirements:
- Degree in Data Analytics, Statistics, Mathematics, Accounting, Finance, Economics, or similar.
- Proficiency in using Microsoft excel & PowerPoint and knowledge of data modelling tools.
- Preferably understanding knowledge of ERP (enterprise resource planning) & DMS (distributor management system) system.
- Good Command of English both written and spoken.
- As part of your job scope, you may be required to travel to provinces or cities that may happen from time to time.

Job Description: + Job summary:Implement policy, processes and check, find document for process claim to supplier and check Account Payable for process payment to ensure governance over the Suppliers Receivable and Account Payable function.+ General Responsibilities:- Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources- Prepare payment to client on time base on payment term contractual- Find documents activity for issue Debit Note to client- Check the source of discount, promotion scheme by clients- Check and accrual A&P Fund & Market Hygiene for suppliers by suppliers- Check Price Structure and provide LTP to Invoices team to create price list and set on systems- Check Rebate whether it absorbs by clients- Check with supplier contract for clarifications- Check other documents that provide service to supplier- Prepare DN/Invoice (Signed by BUC) for reimbursement or confirming to deduct from A&P funds- Send hard copy of Debit Note and supporting document to suppliers- Confirm to suppliers even email after sending all the documents- Check and follow up with clients for payment overdue through email or phone call- Discuss with BUC or DCF for the disputing of Debit Note- Prepare supplier account report and send to DCF for checking and making approval- Other's task assigned by manager
Job Requirement: + Job Requirements:- Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the business and industry- Demonstrate basic knowledge in managing Account Payable & Supplier receivable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practices- Proven hands-on experience in SAP accounting applications is an advantage- Demonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skills- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)- Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken- Bachelor or basic certification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline (preferred)- Minimum two years’ experience in a similar role.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information DKSH Cambodia Administration Manager 087800338 jobs.kh@dksh.com Phnom Penh No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087800338

Job Description:
- To strengthen research capacity at UP
- To generate external grant income to support research at UP and Cambodia
- Maximize research publications associated with UP
- To assist Faculties in planning, coordinating, funding and conducting research projects which lead to
publications and which will enhance the standing of UP locally and internationally
- To ensure that research skills are embedded across curricula – both horizontally and vertically
- To seek research collaboration and funding both locally and internationally.
- To work with UP research team members to ensure that the projects are devised, planned, and completed efficiently and effectively.
- To oversee the coordination, supervision and monitoring of staff research projects ensuring quality
research outputs
- Chair UP’s Research Committee and support research thesis
- Organize annual UP research conference
Research &  relationships
- To strengthen UP’s strategic research direction and long-term planning for research at UP
- Working with UP research team, creatively identify and co-ordinate areas for research that enhance and extend the UP-research portfolio
- To develop and monitor research budgets
- To develop proposals and apply for international grants/funding to support research development at UP.
- To seek and consolidate external opportunities for research collaboration locally and internationally
- To oversee the quality of all research projects at UP across disciplines
- To support development of quality research postgraduate programs
- To undertake own research projects with annual publications
- Contribute to and participate in national and international conferences and similar events
-  Responsible for own professional development in continually updating knowledge and skills in research


** Support
- Continue to maintain the work of the UPRC (IRB) to ensure it meets the WHO Standard
- Operating Procedures for Ethics Committees and integrate any new national guidelines.
- Maintain effective organization, processes, policies and pr- Provide guidance and support as required to staff undertaking research at all stages of projects
- To co-ordinate and participate in training for supervisors/advisors to ensure a high standard of research supervision at UP
- To co-ordinate and implement continuing professional development for staff in the area of research
according to UP strategic plan as well as staff goals
- Contribute to collaborative decision making within the research group
- Assure data integrity through use of appropriate principles, standards and techniques for measurement, analysis, and reporting
- Ensure ethical standards are followed
- Ensure available health data is easy to interpret/use for university planning purposes
- Perform job duties with discretion and professionalism
Job Requirement:
1. Experience:
- 3 years of experience in scientific research.
- Experience leading a research team
- Experience with various methods research, that may include laboratory research, public health
research, quantitative or qualitative research methods
- Experience with proposal writing, grant writing, research collaborations, scientific writing and publishing research papers
- Experience of managing grants
- Have published a number of papers in high-quality peer-reviewed journals.
2. Education:
- Master’s Degree/Doctor’s Degree in health-related field
- Proficiency in English language and ideally in Khmer
3. Skills/Competencies:
- Advanced knowledge of research designs and methodologies, evaluation methodologies, quantitative and qualitative analysis, scientific writing, proposal and grant
- writing, and reporting
- Ability to interpret data and other information to a wide variety of audiences accurately effectively, and concisely
- Ability to communicate effectively on social and scientific issues, orally and in writing, and excellent
presentation skills
- Ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment with multidisciplinary teams, the public, diverse communities, health professionals, and elected officials
- Knowledge of data privacy laws, medical ethics, and protections for research subjects
- Cultural competency
4. Personal Qualities
- Strong communication skills across multidiscipline
- Proven leadership and management skills
- Strong coordinating skills
- Positive attitude and behavior in a multicultural environment
- Ability to work under pressure and work to deadlines

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
1.	Achieve assigned area’s secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Plan, develop, manage, control, implement and evaluate sales activities to ensure achievement of secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Provide effective leadership to a team of Field Sales and conduct field accompaniments
	Ensure effective execution of the FIT strategies to maximise sell-out/sales opportunities
	Ensure proper execution of national and localised promotions
	Provide feedback on market information to gain competitive advantage by pre-empting competitor’s moves and work with the relevant parties for counter measures
	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken
Company Profile: Cambrew Ltd.  the largest and most modern brewery in the country, produces a variety of national and international beer, stout, soft drink and water. Its brewery is situated in the main port city of Cambodia known as Sihanoukville, about 230km west of the capital Phnom Penh.Cambrew (Angkor Beer) portfolio of Beers, Stouts, Soft Drinks and bottled water in Cambodia. Our brands include the Kingdom’s most loved beer – Angkor Premium Beer, Angkor Premium Extra Stout, Klang, Black Panther, Turbog, Carlsberg, Guinness, Pepsi, Angkor Puro and many more. Company Profile: It has strong R&D centers in Taiwan and Xiamen. Since 1999, Top (Xiamen) Electronics Co., Ltd. has developed into a factory in Xiamen Torch High-tech Park with an area of ​​nearly 50,000 square meters, with an annual output of cash registers/tax control cash registers, POS machines, barcode scanners, electronic The enterprise with more than 1 million scales is the largest export factory of tax-controlled cash registers in China. At present, 60% of the products of the company are exported to Europe, America, Middle East, Southeast Asia and other countries and regions, and are highly praised by customers.

	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken

Job Description:
- Representing company for business relationship with business partners in purpose of generating sale performance and productivity.  
- Ensuring company branding, PR and communication working well to contribute with company short-term and long-term strategies. 
- Leading and onboarding all business and individual customers with a need to finance vehicles, equipment, machinery, and other suitable assets 
- Coaching the sale team to assess the financing criteria, pricing, KYC, required document and site visit at customers' home and business location. 
- Reviewing the customers' credit application, cash flow, security, etc. and proceeding the packs of credit applications for approval. 
- Working closely with dealer partners to bring in more and more customers to acheive the sale and revenue targets. 
- Working with other departments for the legal document and asset delivery effectivley at a good leadership manner
- Playing as a leader role with lending team and other team for loan late collection and recovery. 
- Having well understanding on assest financing business and nature.
- Training and mentoring the lending team for better performance and market competition.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
Compliance Training:

• Ensure all employees complete global compliance mandatory courses based on timeline.
• Locally revise compliance training materials and deliver training to target employees.
• Work closely with global team on compliance learning material, learning system management and report.
• Consolidate the learning completion report and update to L&D manager and HRBPs for next actions as needed.

Employee Development:

• Analyse, design, manage employees’ learning need/path via LinkedIn learning platform.
• Keep track on employees’ learning path completion based on each quarter. 
• Roll out monthly/quarterly/yearly learning recognition program
• Work with external training vendors on the required courses needed by each department/employee.
• Design training materials and execute training according to business/employee need.

Graduate Trainee Program:

• Work with regional team to ensure GT process is up to date aligned with other markets under Carlsberg Group
• Recruit based on company/market plan
• Onboard GT based on regional timeline
• Effectively keep track on assignment rotation with mentors
• Identify the issues or improvement areas along the execution.

Company Onboarding:

• Work with HRBPs to ensure OB process is effectively implemented by related stakeholders.
• Arrange monthly onboarding and quarterly brewery visit for new joiners.
• Delivery training (only HR contents) 
• Update/revise OB contents accordingly to the change of business.

Training Administration:

• Arrange/prepare training venue, refreshment, and other materials. 
• Work with Finance team for vendor registration, training payment request, and other claims as needed.
• Other tasks assign by L&D manager
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

• 1-2 years of L&D experience 
• Strong communication skills
• Proven people management skills.
• Self-driven to handle the function independently.
• Confident in both written and spoken communication with the ability to present to large audiences
• Organizational and planning skills to manage time and to meet deadlines and objectives
• Strong personal commitment to improving your own knowledge and skills.

Educational / minimum requirements:

• Bachelor/master’s degree in human resource management or related fields. 
• Good communication skills in English (Spoken & Written)

Job Description: Job PurposeThe Surveyor performs duties as directed, by making exact measurements and supporting all disciplines with a quality layout for unit installation. Provide data relevant to the shape, contour, gravitation, location, elevation, or dimension of land or land features on or near the earth's surface for engineering, construction, and other purposes.Requirements• Conduct field layouts and surveying activities• Good knowledge in Land survey, Contour survey using total station and Latest Survey techniques• Conducting topographic surveys to gather data for building design and construction• Operating the Total Station instrument to measure distances, angles, and elevations• Recording survey data accurately and efficiently and preparing necessary reports• Performing quality control checks on survey data to ensure accuracy• Maintaining and calibrating survey equipment• Collaborating with engineers, architects, and other construction professionals to meet project requirements• Creating a survey sketch based on the physical survey and related documents• Interpreting and preparing maps, plans, and other technical drawings• In-depth understanding of contour maps, sketching, and levels• May oversee some subcontractor work activities, as assigned• Perform other duties assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement: Desired Profile• 5 years of experience as a Field Surveyor in residential projects with a certification or degree in Surveying or a related field, and have experience in using Total Station instruments for building and construction surveys• Knowledge of software applications such as AutoCAD and MS Excel is mandatory• Good communication, understanding of construction drawings in English Language• Problem-solving and organizational skills are essential for this role

Job Description:
1.	Achieve assigned area’s secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Plan, develop, manage, control, implement and evaluate sales activities to ensure achievement of secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Provide effective leadership to a team of Field Sales and conduct field accompaniments
	Ensure effective execution of the FIT strategies to maximise sell-out/sales opportunities
	Ensure proper execution of national and localised promotions
	Provide feedback on market information to gain competitive advantage by pre-empting competitor’s moves and work with the relevant parties for counter measures
	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken

Job Description: • Handle all clearing entries of DB Schenker receivables. Ensure correct accounting entries are being made and numbers are reflecting actual status• Responsible for DB Schenker collection and ensure that physical amount tally with General Ledger balance• Handle Petty Cash. Ensure petty cash request form and approvals are in place properly as per authority matrix. Reimbursement need to be done timely to cover business requirement and ensure GLs are correctly posted. Cash count, a crucial factor in petty cash process, need to be filed with accurate documentation, amount, and acknowledged by manager in charge• Ensure that there are proper control systems in DB Schenker Cambodia and no fraud due to poor control environment of cash and bank transactions. Work toward to ensure that no 'A' is received during the internal audit, no 'NO' answer is received during procedural audit and no Management letter during external audit• Ensure that all reports meet deadlines and expected quality. To make sure all statutory filings are made on time. Check and make sure daily transaction in complying with local taxes, accounting rules, regulations and standards as well as Global policies are met• Other assignments and projects assigned by Chief Finance Officer/Finance Controller.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree holder in Accounting / Finance / Auditing- Good computer literacy: MS. Word, Excel (Advanced level is preferable), Outlook/Email, Internet- Good command of English in both verbal and writing communication; Knowledge of Mandarin Chinese is an advantage- Good interpersonal skills and ability to engage with team and manage the workload- Self-management and sound knowledge of being a highly responsible- Understand the sense of urgency; commit to deadline and 100% compliance- Have attention to details** How to apply:Interested candidates are required to submit CV with recent photo and cover letter to kh.sm.pnh.recruitment@dbschenker.com or telegram:  099 222 575. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews.
Company Profile: DB Schenker is the world's leading global logistics provider - we support industry and trade in the global exchange of goods through land transport, worldwide air and ocean freight, contract logistics and supply chain management. Integrated logistics resides at the world's most important intersections, where the flow of goods creates an effective link between carriers. Our value-added services ensure the flow of goods continues seamlessly and supply chains stay lean and optimized for success. Our business holds top positions in automotive, technology, consumer goods, trade fair logistics, special transports, and special events logistics. DB Schenker group has more than 76,000 employees worldwide in 2000 locations around the world.Working Schedule:Monday to Friday: 8:00am to 5:30pm (Lunch Break an hour)2 Saturday (Half): 8:00am to 12:00pm

Job Description:
Does this sound like you?
• You are curious about why people behave the way they do and finding solutions that genuinely make a difference to their everyday lives.
• You challenge the conventional in search of better ideas, yet you embrace and see the value in shamelessly reapplying proven ideas.
• You are inspired by the opportunity to do this on leading global brands including Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta and Powerade across the SEA region. You will closely partner with our incredible Bottling Partners and lead the Coca-Cola system on all aspects of the business including Short and Long term Business Planning (BP), Marketing and Innovation of our leading brands and importantly our sustainability agenda.
• This incredible opportunity awaits the right candidate to make their mark in the role of Franchise Operations Manager – Cambodia. Reporting directly VN/KH Franchise Director, you will be autonomous, and you will influence and shape the agenda.

Focus, Scope, & Impact:
Ensures business results, alignment with Organizational Unit (OU) and “Bottler”. Works closely with the Franchise Operations Director; to manage operations across the Cambodia market identifying and capturing new opportunities across the franchise. Cambodia is a 30MUC business managing the relationship with one bottler and internal stakeholders.

Responsible for:
• Achieving business growth (Revenue, OI & Execution) in Coca-Cola and Bottler, by shaping and implementing core capabilities and managing franchise leadership
• Leads the implementation of Coca-Cola Company’s vision, with strong connections internally and externally, able to identify business opportunities and translate them into concrete actions with an agile and effective decision making.
• Manages the day-to-day operations of the frontline franchise including marketing, commercial and financial; Leads localization of plans; monitors evolution of key indicators to achieve BP objectives; leads communication flow and business routines between “Bottler” and Coca-Cola concerning priorities, programs, address market issues and performance; cooperates with bottlers to ensure local relevance and alignment with overall business; reviews and implements revenue growth opportunities/solutions.
• In partnership with the “Bottler”, manages projects with them and leads the Route-to-market (RTM), execution and commercialization of them from concept to launch; establishing business systems and procedures and KPIs
• Regarding new products this position has two main responsibilities: identify market insights, risks and opportunities and communicate them timely and effectively to marketing, commercial strategy and innovation functions to be considered as input for current innovation processes.
• Wire with other regions and operations (even international) peers to ensure best practice sharing and alignment.
• Lead Governance model between Coca-Cola and Bottler to ensure Non-alcoholic Ready-to-drink (NARTD) Growth, capture the growth plan and align with OU Strategy.
• Develop people and system capability and ensure a productive relationship with the bottlers at all levels. Build a strong team capable of working with the bottlers effectively to deliver business targets. Develop the capability of team members by effective coaching and on-job-training.
• Develops recommendations to The Coca-Cola Company (TCCC) on Bottling Agreements terms
• Working alongside Public Affairs, Communication and Sustainability (PACS) drives the WWW and RCG strategy and implementation.
• Role models the TCCC Values and Behaviors including leading and collaborating in a networked community.
Job Requirement:
KEY SUCCESS PARAMETERS

Experience:
5+ years within the Coca-Cola System or within the Industry. Desired experience in Bottling, Marketing and Commercial. Recommended experience in Sales, Marketing, Commercial Strategy Experience and understanding of channel and customer.

Work Focus:
• Guides and collaborates with bottler in the decision-making process involved in key areas such as RTM, Point of Sales (POS), Customer, Incentives NARTD vs total portfolio and other commercial initiatives.
• Acts with a high level of autonomy within strategic framework so decision making must be sound and considered.
• Continuous identification of regional marketing and executional opportunities, generating value across the System aligned to the OU strategic priorities

Communication Focus:

EXTERNAL:
• Bottlers: GMs and Managers: Commercials, Marketing and production teams
• Market: Government, Industry Bodies, Customers, Assets and Agencies
• Align, lead governance model and provide solutions to detonate local opportunities.
• Follows a collaborative business process and routines to effectively bring about incremental business results, leveraging system competencies, and guaranteeing efficient capability and resource optimization – Franchise Leadership.

INTERNAL:
• Franchise Unit leader, Commercial, Customer & Leadership (CCL), Marketing, Finance, Planning, PACS, Strategy, Global Customer teams etc.
• Works closely with the Frontline (FL) team, and all frontline functions including Marketing, CCL & Finance to create synergies and ensure resources.
• Follows a collaborative business process and routines to effectively bring about incremental business results, leveraging system competencies, and guaranteeing efficient capability and resource optimization – Franchise Leadership. Besides protect NARTD growth and size new partnership/ business opportunities.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
